DOC.brief_summary: This is a single dose open-label comparative pharmacokinetic study to assess the pharmacokinetic characteristics of sildenafil between HIP0908 (chewable tablet) and Viagra (tablet) in healthy male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Sildenafil Following Administration of an Chewable Tablet of Sildenafil Relative to ViagraÂ® Conventional Oral Tablet in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: age between 20 and 45 weight : over 55kg and 18.5 < BMI, 25.0 have to give their consent to participating clinical trial by oneself has a medical history of hypersensitivity to drug including PDE5 inhibitor and QTc > 430ms or uncontrolled arrhythmia
